intro_only_event_multi_christmasgift_202: We brought a present for you today!

It’s packed with our wishes that your day will be
wonderful!

If you listen closely tonight, maybe you’ll hear the
Pokémon singing.

A beautiful sound that travels throughout Pasio...
How lovely!

I hope you have fun experiencing all kinds of
music today, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!

We’ll be sure to go all out and liven things
up, too!
